author: Special Correspondent
text: A 20-year-old man, who molested a six-month-old girl, was arrested and remanded on Thursday. According to the police, Bharati the suspect, works at a construction site in Valsaravakkam. Many of the workers stay at the site. On Wednesday night, he attempted to molest the child of his co-worker. When the child began crying, her parents rushed in and nabbed Bharati. He was handed over to the Tirumangalam police.
title: Man held for molesting six-month-old child
